QuestData.Title: Spellbound
QuestData.Description: Jaina possesses several very powerful magic artifacts. These items travel with her at all times, and are never far from her grasp. I have an interest in one of these items.$b$bA tome, filled with knowledge, passed from one archmage to another. I have only ever seen glimpses of it.$b$bNow that we fight on opposite sides I see no issue in removing the tome from her possession.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Jaina's Weathered Spellbook from Violet Rise.
